title: Meet Luana Lopes Lara: The 29-year-old ex-ballerina spent summers working for Ray Dalio and Ken Griffin—now she’s the youngest female self-made billionaire
description: Following in the footsteps of Taylor Swift and Scale AI’s Lucy Guo, Luana Lopes Lara has just been crowned the world’s youngest female self-made billionaire. The millennial founder built an $11 billion startup in just six years.

title: We're high earners with student debt and kids. Here's how we continue to build wealth.
description: As millennial HENRYs juggling student loans and kids, we've learned to budget, automate, and invest to stay financially secure.

title: Inside the private clubs for the Gen Z and millennial day traders serious about making money in markets
description: Members of private day trading clubs who offered Business Insider a glimpse into their circles said social events and networking were perks of membership.
